name: Q'ewar Sack Doll & Mattress Set ~ Pink ~ Waldorf Style Doll
description:
Q'ewar Sack Doll and Mattress Set ~ Pink

(pure wool mattresses also available upon request. Custom orders most welcome for this resource)

$25.00per set plus p&h.

Set Inlcudes:
1 x Pink Q'ewar Sack Doll
Light Skin Tone ~ 12cm high
Knitted Mattress with polyfil stuffing
Calico Bag

Other colours available, please refer to second photo.

This beautiful Waldorf style doll is the perfect size for little hands and their pocket and is recommended for use by children aged 3years and above.

Natural Play for Children is proud to be supporting the Q'ewar Doll Project
http://www.qewar.com.au/

For a customised postage & handling quotation, please contact seller and we can create a custom listing especially for you. Local delivery and collection also available from Lake Macquarie, NSW.

name: Resources Set for storybook The Very Hungry Caterpillar
description:
These resources are made to order, please allow 10 days for completion of order.

Beautiful crochet and knitted resources to bring to life the story book The Very Hungry Caterpillar.

Set Inlcudes:

5 x Knitted Oranges (NPFC)
4 x Knitted Strawberries (NPFC)
3 x Knitted Plums (NPFC)
2 x Knitted Pears (NPFC)
1 x Knitted Apple (NPFC)
1 x Crochet Caterpillar (Created by Dale Eadie)
1 x Knitted Cocoon & Butterfly (Created by Snuggly Critters)

All resources come in a calico drawstring bag for ease of storage.

name: Set of 10 Loose Drilled Stones ~ Now On Sale
description:
On Sale!    -   Set of 10 Loose Drilled Stones now only $40.00 per set plus p&h normally $7.00 per stone plus p&h.

Loose drilled stones, Perfect addition to your threading sets, creative play, maths area and they also make great building material.

Photograph forms part of product description.

Stones are of various colours, shapes and sizes due to the uniqueness of each natural stone.

Custom and bulk orders most welcome, discounts apply for orders of 100+ stones.  So grab some friends or fellow centres and combine your orders and save $.

Please contact seller for customised p&h quotation.
$14.00 cover postage up to 3kg Australia wide with tracking, but most times p&h is normally cheaper.

name: Natural Threading Set ©
description:
ON SALE FOR $45.00 plus p&h Australia Wide.

(Normally $55.00 plus p&h Australia Wide)

Due to high demand, this resource is currently made to order.  Please allow 7 days for completion of order.

This threading set is a signature resource of Natural Play for Children designed and created by Maureen Hayes in 2011.

This set includes 13 pieces:

1 x Handmade toggle and thread (your choice of jute or woollen plaited string)
5 x drilled loose stones of varying sizes
7 x mixture of natural drilled resources such as timber and shells.

Each set comes complete in calico drawstring bag for ease of storage.

Set recommended for use by children 3 years of age and over with supervision.

Photograph below is an example of a custom order previous sold.

name: Large Rustic Post & Rail Fences © - set of 4
description:
Lovingly handcrafted Large Rustic Post & Rail Fencing made from recycled natural Australian eucalyptus timber.

$50.00 per set of 4 plus p&h.

Fences also sold individually at $13.00 per fence p&h

Each fence is approx 15cm high and approx. 27cm long and come complete in a large calico drawstring bag ready to take on your next outing.

A great addition to any child's farm set, creative play area and the larger fences are perfect for sand pit play. Perfect size for those little hands of your toddler, with larger posts and chunky rails.

Children should be appropriately guided and supervised at all times when using natural play resources.

Recommended for use by children 3 years and above with supervision.

Please advise your suburb and postcode for an accurate postage quotation.

If you live outside NSW, we can apply natural beeswax  to the fences allowing us to post them Australia wide.  If you live outside NSW, please selected Sealed Fences from the drop down menu.

name: Tassie Oak Post and Rail Fencing © Set of 4
description:
Lovingly created by hand, these Tassie Oak Post and Rail Fences are the perfect addition to any childs farm set for imaginary play.
 
$30.00 per set of 4 fences plus p&h - Australia wide

Fences also sold individually at $8.00 each plus p&h.

Fences measure approx. 17cm long and approx. 10cm high with a post diam. of approx. 2.5cm
Textured/grooved rails for that added sensory experience.

All fences come complete in a drawstring calico bag for ease of storage.

Children should be appropriately guided and supervised at all times when using natural play resources.

Recommended for use by children 3 years and above.

name: Small Rustic Post and Rail Fencing © Set of 4 - NSW Only
description:
Set of 4 fences = $20.00 plus p&h

Fences also sold separately @ $6.00 per fence plus p&h

Lovingly handcrafted small rustic post and rail fencing made from recycled Australian eucalyptus timber, inspired by the Waldorf Steiner style of play.

A great addition to any child's farm set,sensory and play-doh tables or perfect for those outdoor adventures and sandpit play.

Each fence is approx 10cm high and approx. 17cm long and come complete in calico drawstring bag ready to take on your next outing.

Children should be appropriately guided and supervised at all times when using natural play resources.

Recommended for use by children 3 years and above.

If you live outside NSW, we can apply a natural beeswax polis to the timber fences allowing us to post this item Australia wide. If you live outside NSW, please select Fences Sealed with Natural Beeswax polish from the drop down menu. Small Additional Charges apply.

description:

$35.00 plus p&h.

name: Knitted Doll Sling
description:
Knitted doll sling perfect for role play & home corner.

$35.00 plus p&h
Various colours available.

Perfect gift for those children about to become a big brother or sister.
 
We also have smaller sizes available suitable to be placed on a childs arm, for those children who are not comfortable with having things around their neck.  $15.00 plus p&h for smaller slings.

name: Fetled Basket with Solid Wooden Eggs, Medium
description:
On Sale This Weekend Only!
Now Only $32.00 plus $8.00 p&h anywhere in Australia

Medium Felt Basket Playset
Set normally $37.00 plus $8 p&h anywhere in Australia
Express Post Available, additional charges apply.

Set includes:
1 x medium felted basket
10 x  solid wooden chicken size eggs
 
Set comes complete in calico drawstring bag for ease of storage.

This basket was hand knittted by Nicola from A Charlie Horse using 100% pure new wool and then wet felted to make it strong and durable.

This medium sized basket measures 26cm tall including the handle and 13cm in diameter across the base.

Recommended for use by children 3 years and over with supervision. 

Photographs form part of the product description.
Photo 3 is a close up view of the eggs used in this set.  You will receive 10 eggs in this set.

Natural Play for Children stocks a range of outsourced products that compliment our natural handmade range of products.

name: Malu-Kangaroo - Hardcover Preloved Storybook
description:
On Sale This Weekend Only!
Book now $13.00 incl. regular p&h anywhere in Australia


Preloved hardcover storybook in very good condition.

$15.00 including p&h to anywhere in Australia

From the back cover of the book:

Malu-Kangaroo is a modern story that tells how people first learnt to surf. 

The poignant tale weaves together the past and present to create an evocative narrative for our time.

With beautiful text and rich, intricate artwork by acclaimed Indigenous artist, Bronwyn Bancroft, Malu-Kangaroo will charm children and adults alike.
